rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalist entrance hall with a clean design and minimal ornamentation. This space is oriented to the east as per Vastu guidelines, allowing positive energy to enter.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: The main living area featuring open space and natural light. Positioned towards the south-west for social interactions and energy flow in line with Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located on the north side, ensuring a calm environment with an attached ensuite bathroom. The orientation is designed to enhance sleep quality per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable secondary bedroom situated in the west region of the villa for balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: An additional bedroom placed in a quiet corner, oriented towards the north-west to maintain harmony as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A minimalist dining area near the kitchen, designed for family meals. Its placement is aligned with south-east to ensure positive energy circulation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen space integrated into the living-dining area. The design follows a minimalistic approach and adheres to Vastu principles by placing it in an appropriate location for efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office located away from the living areas to ensure privacy. The positioning is oriented towards north-west for clarity and focus as advised by Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom for guests, strategically placed near the entrance to accommodate visitors while maintaining a minimalist aesthetic. The orientation considers energy balance.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: A bathroom adjacent to master bedroom for convenience, designed with minimal fixtures and proper ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The primary entrance door is placed in the south-east to invite positive energy. Minimalistic design with a simple threshold.

openings.name: Front Door Window
openings.description: A large window near the front entrance to allow ample natural light and maintain energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: A balcony opening on the north-west side providing access to an outdoor space for relaxation, following minimalistic design standards.

openings.name: Backdoor Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance designed to serve as an emergency exit and provide additional accessibility while ensuring balance in energy distribution.
